text: János Börzsei (9 October 1921 – 30 August 2007) was a former Hungarian footballer. He won a gold medal with the Hungarian national team at the 1952 Summer Olympics in Helsinki, Finland. ==Honours== ;MTK Budapest *Nemzeti Bajnokság I: 1951, 1953, 1957–58 ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1921 births Category:2007 deaths Category:Footballers from Budapest Category:Hungarian footballers Category:Hungary international footballers Category:Footballers at the 1952 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic footballers of Hungary Category:Olympic gold medalists for Hungary Category:Olympic medalists in football Category:Medalists at the 1952 Summer Olympics Category:Nemzeti Bajnokság I players Category:MTK Budapest FC players Category:Liga I players Category:Hungarian expatriate footballers Category:Hungarian expatriate sportspeople in Romania Category:Expatriate footballers in Romania Category:Association football defenders
title: János Börzsei
